sentences.en: Gaza will writhe in agony and Ekron too , for her hope will wither.
sentences.cn: 迦萨看见甚痛苦.以革伦因失了盼望蒙羞.

sentences.en: Her remarks made him writhe with shame.
sentences.cn: 她的话羞得他十分难堪.

sentences.en: Her words made him writhe with shame.
sentences.cn: 她的话使他惭愧地感到浑身不自在.

sentences.en: His dazed eyes stare at the eels, which still writhe and entwine.
sentences.cn: 他茫然地盯着仍在翻滚缠绕的鳗鱼。

sentences.en: His family could only cry and watch this expert marksman twist and writhe in his death agonies.
sentences.cn: 他的家人只能嚎啕大哭，眼睁睁地看着这个出色的神枪手在扭曲翻滚中痛苦地死去。

sentences.en: I grin while you writhe with the pain that I deal.
sentences.cn: 我微笑着看着你被我折磨的样子.

sentences.en: Of course students will writhe under such unjust treatment.
sentences.cn: 当然学生会对这样不公正的对待感到不快.

sentences.en: Students will writhe under such unjust treatment.
sentences.cn: 学生们因受到这样不公正的待遇而感到非常难受.

sentences.en: The embroidered serpents back of these snakeskin garments writhe when you use them.
sentences.cn: 你看到这副蛇皮手套的手背上绣制的毒蛇图案在你使用时会痛苦的蠕动.

sentences.en: The more the worms writhe , the more I crush out their entrails!
sentences.cn: 我就越恨不得挤出它们的内脏!

sentences.en: The more the worms writhe, the more I yearn to crush out their entrails!
sentences.cn: 虫子越受苦, 我就越想碾碎它们.

sentences.en: The subject makes her writhe with embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 这个话题让她难堪得坐立不安。

sentences.en: They surely writhe under this pressure.
sentences.cn: 他们肯定对这种压力感到苦恼.

sentences.en: While you are at peace I shall writhe in the torments of hell.
sentences.cn: 当你得到安息的时候,我还要受折磨.

trans.tran_en: to twist your body from side to side violently, especially because you are suffering pain

trans.tran_cn: （因极度痛苦而）扭动或翻滚，痛苦，苦恼，蠕动，蜿蜒移动
扭动，转动，弄歪，盘绕，缠绕
